description:
Totally Accurate Battle Simulator gives you command of wobblers from ancient lands, spooky places,
and fantasy worlds. Use your tactics to create an army, then watch then fight in the wobbliest
physics system ever created.

v0.1.0.description:
First release! Current features include:
- Randomized unit unlocks, with selectable factions available
  - Option to make units progressive per-faction instead of each being a specific unit
- Option for secret unlocks as locations
  - Option to choose whether map secrets should be locked in Sandbox until getting to them in Campaign, and how secret map unlocks are handled
- Selectable campaigns
  - Logic difficulties for Introduction, Adventure, Challenge, Dynasty, and Simulation campaigns (currently others are considered completable from the start)
- (Hopefully functional) slot co-op

For support, ask in the [Archipelago discord thread](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1348142956682547230).
v0.1.0.title: Version 0.1.0: Initial Release
